attributes.action: United Kingdom Independence Day on the 24th of June should be a public holiday
attributes.additional_details: To Celebrate our Day of Independence a public holiday should be held on the 24th of June Annually. A celebration of the people's fight against the odds to take back the power that was taken away from us by those that had no right to do so.
attributes.background: We the signed request that the 24th of June be made a public holiday to celebrate the United Kingdom Independence Day if we, the people, vote to leave the European Union on on the 23rd of June.
